fullName: Book Management API Validations: Post and fetch a review for a book

labels.name: story
labels.value: Post and fetch a review for a book

labels.name: testClass
labels.value: Post and fetch a review for a book

name: Post and fetch a review for a book

steps.name: Given  a user signs up and logs in successfully
User Signup: expected 200, actual 200. User created successfully. Response: {"message":"User created successfully"}

User Login: expected 200, actual 200. Login successful. Response: {"access_token":"eyJ0eXAiOiJKV1QiLCJhbGciOiJIUzI1NiJ9.eyJzdWIiOiJib29rZmxvd191c2VyXzE3NDkwMTYwMzYwMzNAbWFpbC5jb20iLCJleHAiOjE3NDkwMTc4Mzd9.V-Gj1u5NWblgsDC0SS_-WOJupqz0Le0Imp8_PYHz6YA","token_type":"bearer"}
Given  a book payload with name "ReviewBook", author "Alice", year 2024, and summary "A book to review" is prepared
Prepared book payload: Book{id=37237, name='ReviewBook', author='Alice', published_year=2024, book_summary='A book to review', cover_image_url='null'}
When  user sends a request to create a new book
Book creation request response: Status: 200, Body: {"book_summary":"A book to review","id":37237,"author":"Alice","published_year":2024,"name":"ReviewBook"}
And  user posts a review with rating 5 and text "Excellent book!" for the created book
Posted review for book ID: 37237, rating: 5, text: Excellent book!
And  user fetches reviews for the created book
Fetched reviews for book ID: 37237, Response: {"detail":"Not Found"}
When  user posts a review with rating 3 and text "Good but not great" for the created book
Posted review for book ID: 37237, rating: 3, text: Good but not great
And  user fetches average rating for the created book
Fetched average rating for book ID: 37237, Response: {"detail":"Not Found"}
